Texts.Eng: The more fed your animals are, the happier they are. They'll mature from babies faster, and (soon)will be more liable to mate and produce offspring.

^orange;Livestock^reset; grow a whole lot faster when you toss them some ^orange;Cattle Feed^reset; to munch on. ^orange;Grind up corn^reset; in your ^orange;hand mill or extractor^reset; to get some.
